contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Quesnoy-sur-Deûle |region = Nord-Pas-de-Calais |department = Nord |arrondissement = Lille |canton = Quesnoy-sur-Deûle |INSEE = 59482 |postal code = 59890 |mayor = Roger Lefebvre |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = [[Lille Métropole Communauté urbaine|Lille Métropole]] |longitude = 3.0003 |latitude = 50.7131 |elevation m = 23 |elevation min m = 12 |elevation max m = 21 |area km2 = 14.36 |population = 6380 |population date = 1999 }} '''Quesnoy-sur-Deûle''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Nord (department)|Nord]] [[Departments of France|department]] in northern [[France]]. It is part of the [[Urban Community of Lille Métropole]]. ==Heraldry== {{Blazon-arms | img1=Blason ville fr Quesnoy-sur-Deûle (Nord).svg | legend1=Arms of Quesnoy-sur-Deûle | text=The arms of Quesnoy-sur-Deûle are [[blazon]]ed :<br />{{SharedArms|Checky.Or.gu}} }} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Nord department]] ==References== [[File:Quesnoy-sur-Deûle - Eglise Saint-Michel 1.jpg|thumb|left|Church of Saint Michel, Quesnoy-sur-Deûle]] * [http://www.insee.fr/fr/methodes/nomenclatures/cog/fichecommunale.asp?codedep=59&codecom=482 INSEE commune file] {{Nord communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Quesnoy-Sur-Deule}} [[Category:Communes of Nord (French department)|Quesnoysurdeule]] {{Nord-geo-stub}}
